title: 菜单
author: ll雨
txt_content: 有没用推荐好的菜单   CC菜单能不能 用快捷键打开菜单的  比如 Shift+f 打开菜单  手持右键 有点麻烦

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=920023
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=918078
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=931518

都挺不错的， 比如 Shift+f 打开菜单  这个没见过。

而且手持右键也不是很麻烦吧

replies.author: HotPe_e
replies.txt_content:
TrMenu: https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=918078
DeluxeMenus: https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=920023
TabooMenu: https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=798904

SHIFT + F执行命令 你可以试试SKRIPT 进行监听 来写个小脚本
或者直接按F 执行命令: https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=782759
